1: <pb/><e>A bit Asaf ti'</e> <pb/><t>Ay wal ec' Dios bay is wajayil eb dios.*fn* Lanan beyc'ulnewi nan xol eb dios tu', chi yalon Cham:</t>
2: <t>¿Bak'in ok e bekcan jun e beybal tu' yin e lek'ti' beyc'ulal, cax che yaon oc e ba yetok eb unem yobtakil?</t>
3: <t>A ti' e yet, moj wal tol che yun tojolal bay eb c'am yip, c'al bay eb c'amxa mam, c'amxa txutx. Unek tojolal bay eb meba', c'al bay eb ayoc yin majilal.</t>
4: <t>Colek el eb c'am yip, c'al eb meba' bay eb unem yobtakil.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Palta ayex ti' xin, man e yojtakok; c'am chi nachaj el e yuj. Lanan e yec'jab xol k'ekk'inal, yuj tu' xan chi c'aycan el tojolal yiban tx'otx' tx'otx' ti' e yuj.</t>
6: <t>Max wal ayin ti', tol dios ex ayex ti', tol e masanil yuninal ex Cham Axac'al Ocok.</t>
7: <t>Akxa tinani' xin, ok ex camok, axca chi yun cam masanil eb anima, ok ex ayc'ay axca yayc'ayc'al juntzanxa eb yajaw, ẍi Dios.</t>
8: <pb/><t>Ach Dios, ajan wan a beyc'ulnen eb cajyom bay sat tx'otx' tx'otx' ti'. Ach ay et masanil nacionlak yulyibank'inal.</t>
